name: LinkHub
description: Save, organize, group, bookmark, and consolidate all of your links into one dashboard PLUS a ToDo List!

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://code.jquery.com/ https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/ https://kit.fontawesome.com/;
